Hey! I'm Will Shalders, a frontend developer in Melbourne.

A little about me.

I am a front end Developer with 6+ years commercial experience. I have worked in a wide variety of environments, from a boutique four person agency to a large in house marketing team.

My skills help bridge the gap between design and back end. I use html, css and javaScript to build responsive, functional web sites.

Reach out and let's have a chat.
